definitions.definition: Any of two or more forms of an element where the atoms have the same number of protons , but a different number of neutrons within their nuclei . Thus, isotopes have the same atomic number but a different mass number .

main_definition: ( nuclear physics ) Any of two or more forms of an element where the atoms have the same number of protons , but a different number of neutrons within their nuclei . Thus, isotopes have the same atomic number but a different mass number .
